EQUATOR - Enhancing the QUAlity and Transparency Of health Research

This website provides summary information from a number of different sources on the numbers of publications. Numbers of systematic reviews are retrieved automatically from PubMed via their API. The number of clinical trial registrations are automatically retrieved from Clinicaltrials.gov via their API. The numbers of systematic review registrations are retrieved manually from the PROSPERO website. Dates on each
